conbody.p: The following conventions are used throughout this document:

strow.stentry: Denotes literal items such as commands, files, routines, path names, signals, messages, and programming language structures.
Denotes variable entries and words or concepts being defined.
Brackets enclose optional portions of a command or directive line.
Ellipses indicate that a preceding element can be repeated.
Indicates that command is being entered at a command prompt in a terminal. The % is the command prompt.
